description: This file defines the 'MenuRun' class and related enums for managing end-to-end menu scanning runs, including handling OCR results, image references, and item results within a menu image processing application.

classes.name: MenuRun
classes.description: Represents a single menu scanning run/session with properties for image, OCR text, item results, and status.

classes.name: MenuRunStatus
classes.description: Enum indicating the overall status of a menu run, with values 'pending', 'success', and 'error'.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of a MenuRun instance with selective property overrides.

methods.name: statusToString
methods.description: Converts MenuRunStatus enum to its string representation.

methods.name: statusFromString
methods.description: Parses a string to its corresponding MenuRunStatus enum value.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Serializes the MenuRun instance to a JSON map for persistence.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a MenuRun instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJsonString
methods.description: Serializes the MenuRun instance to a JSON string.

methods.name: fromJsonString
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a MenuRun instance from a JSON string.

methods.name: summary
methods.description: Provides a compact textual summary of the run, including counts of total, successful, and errored items.
